column4: why can't I see links to synaptic from the desktop/menus?  I'm running as a nis user.. do I need to belong to a certain group?
yes, I don't think you will see taht unless you are in the "admin" group
any way to modify the group name?
you can't run synaptic unless you have sudo rights
I fixed sudo, but the desktop still doesn't show synaptic
did you enable admin in sudoers?
which is the group I belong to in the NIS domain
the system doesn't know to add graphical access for your new group :)
ok.. I was wondering whether that could be changed.. but it's ok
it probably can be - but it probbly isn't worth it ( too many things to track down)
easier to add all "Domain Admin" users to the admin group and make sudoers give rights to "admin"
depends what rights you want them to have of course
